item.text: <textHeader>WHAT IS IT?</textHeader> <textBody>This Creative Toolkit contains approved creative assets that can be utilized to support NBA (Professional Basketball) events. It is segmented by medium and includes visuals for available creative assets along with complete information including where to obtain, usage dates, and key contacts.</textBody> <textHeader>OBJECTIVE</textHeader> <textBody>Creative assets developed to generate Brand awareness and drive volume during Professional Basketball events.</textBody> <textHeader>BRAND GUIDELINES FOR NBA (PROFESSIONAL TEAMS):</textHeader> <textBody>Lead Brand: Sprite</textBody>

ORDERING Order through Design Machine: / Website / User Guide Sizes currently available:
  • 8.5” x 11”
  • 5.5” x 8.5”
  • 7” x 10”
    • Customize with:
  • Team logo

CUSTOMIZATION If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> These TV ads can be used to run during live games or when broadcast on individual stations and can be used until creative changes.
ORDERING Submit orders for TV spots / Broadcast Use Limited to 1 copy of each spot per location.

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.

item.text:
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> These TV Billboards are approved to run on live broadcasts during games. Scripts are not to be recorded, but only to be used as live reads.
Rotation should be equal depending on number of spots chosen to run.
ORDERING Submit orders for TV spots / Billboards for Broadcast Limited to 1 copy per location.

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.

ORDERING & CUSTOMIZATION Sprite Web Banners are available for Sports partner logo customization. Options include:
  • Sustaining or Customizable with Team logo
  • Animated or Static
    • If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

ORDERING Approved Menu board layout.
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestors responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved
    • For printing and installation, contact: The Howard Company / Website / Contact via Email to Order OR Weaver Media / Website / Contact via Email to Order For additional information on the suppliers, click the SUPPLIERS tab.

THE HOWARD COMPANY / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 6 main menu boards (sizes & types) and illuminated boards along with numerous specialty/custom boards for unique applications and locations. Variations include: with/without panel header, with/without acrylic cover, with digital LCD display
  • All menu boards use the same size strips and numbers although colors and font styles can be changed. Menu items and numbers are all separate
  • Magnets can be ordered online. All strips and numbers are direct printed on magnetic material
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as banners and adhesive graphics (floor and wall)
    •  WEAVER MEDIA / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 10 main menu boards including illuminated boards
  • All menu boards use magnetic strips (one strip that included menu items and prices)
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as adhesive graphics (floor and wall), concession stand graphics, banners

ORDERING Obtain pre-approved templates: Design Machine / Website
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestors responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved

ORDERING Visuals are reference only.
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestor's responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved
    • Obtain approved cups and/or templates as listed below:
  • PRIORITY #1 - Approved Red Coca-Cola Iconic Cups are available at the Coke Catalog
  • PRIORITY #2 – Approved Compostable & Environmentally Sustainable Cups can be found at Spread the Red. To be used ONLY in venues that have a composting program. (* Search Key Words “Green cupware”)
  • PRIORITY #3 - Approved Asset Specific Cup Templates can be ordered and customized by Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.
  • PRIORITY #4 – Approved artwork for Partner can be ordered by Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.

ORDERING Approved Templates can be obtained and customized: Design Machine / Website
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestors responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved
ORDERING Approved Templates can be obtained and customized: Design Machine / Website

card.title: PUBLIC ANNOUNCEMENTS
card.approved: TO BE READ DURING LIVE GAMES ON PA SYSTEMS

item.text: VO: Sprite. The Spark. Crack open an ice cold Sprite for a crisp, refreshing splash of lemon-lime. The perfect sip before, during or after the game. Official sponsor of refreshment. Proud partner of basketball.
VO: Sprite. The Spark. Crack open an ice cold Sprite for a crisp, refreshing splash of lemon-lime. Official sponsor of refreshment. Proud partner of basketball.
VO: Sprite. The Spark. Official sponsor of refreshment. Proud partner of basketball.

STATIC SIGNAGE ORDER INSTRUCTIONS This creative is approved to be used In-Venue on Static Vinyl and digital boards. Static Signs (LED back-lit/non back-lit, Dioramas, Rotational signs, Pillars, Billboards, etc., Out-door boards, Stand-alone, Scoreboards, Billboards etc.)
  • All Brand graphics and artwork for Static signage used in stadiums, arena and other venues can be accessed online
  • The brand signage graphics have been created in a wide variety of proportions and styles
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> This creative is approved to use In-Venue on video screens.

ORDERING Sizes have already been created which are listed below each design and are available for download on the Cinema Concepts website. Should you require a different size you will need to fill out an order form. Note there is a charge for customized sizes. Submit orders for In Venue Video Signage via email or 770.956.7460. / Website / cokeinvenue.com User Guide The website link will bring you into the signage site. Once in the site you can view all of the available graphics for Jumbo-Trons and fascia rings. Click on the image and Windows Media Play will display the animation. There are two order forms in Word and PDF formats. The PDF allows you to directly submit the order form. All requests should include the following information:
  • Type of Venue: In Arena, In Concession, Vending, In-Store, In Restaurant
  • Video Type: Jumbotron, Fascia, Video Menu Board, and u-Vending Video
  • Creative Code (found on site under creative visual)
  • Brand
  • Format: .avi, .mov, .swf
  • Size in pixels (width and height)
  • Method of Delivery: FTP Download or Overnight shipment (DVD or Digital Beta Tape)
    • There is a $250 charge per size for orders filled within 4 business days. For rush orders additional fees, as listed on the form, will apply. Billing information for CCNA requestors as well as CCE/Field Managers and Customers is explained on the order form.
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> This creative is approved to use In-Venue on video screens.

ORDERING Sizes have already been created which are listed below each design and are available for download on the Cinema Concepts website. Should you require a different size you will need to fill out an order form. Note there is a charge for customized sizes. Submit orders for In Venue Video Signage via email or 770.956.7460. / Website / cokeinvenue.com User Guide The website link will bring you into the signage site. Once in the site you can view all of the available graphics for Jumbo-Trons and fascia rings. Click on the image and Windows Media Play will display the animation. There are two order forms in word and pdf formats. The pdf allows you to directly submit the order form. All requests should include the following information:
  • Type of Venue: In Arena, In Concession, Vending, In-Store, In Restaurant
  • Video Type: Jumbotron, Fascia, Video Menu Board, and u-Vending Video
  • Creative Code (found on site under creative visual)
  • Brand
  • Format: .avi, .mov, .swf
  • Size in pixels (width and height)
  • Method of Delivery: FTP Download or Overnight shipment (DVD or Digital Beta Tape)
    • There is a $250 charge, per size for orders filled within 4 business days. For rush orders additional fees, listed on the form, will apply. Billing information for CCNA requestors as well as CCE/Field Managers, and Customers is explained on the order form.

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website Daphne Brown / Contact via Email Include in your email:
  • Size needed
  • File Format needed
  • Ship to information

ADDITIONAL CUSTOMIZATION Pricing for Customization of Logo & Custom Copy Template:
  • $95 per truck back layout (Requestor will receive back from Finished Art a customized layout that has been approved by IMC)
  • $50 for each copy and/or logo revision
    • REGION IS RESPONSIBLE FOR COVERING CUSTOMIZATION COSTS. When logo and supportive copy are required, please contact Finished Art to order and customize template within the approved ‘white space’: Finished Art Daphne Brown // 404-355-7902 / Email
